title: Skincare: What’s Right for You? | Reuben Carranza
description:
Today we're going to talk a little bit about skincare. I happen to have a friend and his name is Reuben Carranza. He is the CEO of Kate Somerville. That happens to be one of my favorite skincare lines! He’s going to give us the scoop of what we should be looking at when a skincare line says they have the right ingredients or their product is clinically proven. What does it really mean? Also what's appropriate for all of us for skincare because we're all still learning.

 

We’re also going to dive into another passion of theirs, which is giving back to the community. We’ll talk about their affiliation with Foster Nation and Beauty Changes Lives, and how they aim to make a huge difference in the lives of kids that are aging out of the foster care system and have no place to go.
